meanings.definition: A solid figure with many plane faces, typically more than three.
meanings.sent1: I learned about different polyhedrons in my geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed building various polyhedrons out of paper.
meanings.sent3: The artist created a sculpture of colorful polyhedrons that seemed to dance.
meanings.sent4: In the game, the player had to navigate through a maze of rotating polyhedrons.
meanings.sent5: The crystal exhibit at the museum showcased stunning polyhedrons of all shapes and sizes.
